Julia reminds us about the risk assessment process. It's simple, but it works. #EUmanagestress http://t.co/DHz8h1ZaK0
Differences between countries, sectors, company size, worker group all impact approaches to dealing with psychosocial risk. #EUmanagestress
Sensitivity around work-related #stress can be a barrier to prevention. Is this true in your place of work? #EUmanagestress #SME #bizitalk
Some reasons managers deal with psychosocial risk: requests from employees, absenteeism reduction and legal obligations. #EUmanagestress
Julia Flintrop - managers are concerned about time pressure and dealing with difficult customers. #EUmanagestress http://t.co/7HN1Eq02SF
Legislative, labour inspection and other governmental approaches to psychosocial risk vary widely across EU member states. #EUmanagestress
Lessons? Avoid high levels of work intensity, improve work-life balance and reduce job insecurity. #EUmanagestress
Recent trends: Physical violence is declining while there has been an increase in job insecurity levels. #EUmanagestress
People's working conditions are determined by occupation, economic sector, gender and age. #EUmanagestress
Violence and harassment have the biggest impact on the health of workers. #EUmanagestress
High work intensity and violence & harassment have a high level of association with work-related stress. #EUmanagestress
Oscar Vargas @eurofound presents a joint report on psychosocial risks in Europe. #EUmanagestress #stress #EU http://t.co/z9U7qBn6Wl
Workers with high work intensity and low job control/autonomy suffer more work-related stress compared to other groups. #EUmanagestress
Today Heads of #EUagencies take part in debate on value of Agencies at AT TV @oe1journale. Debate tmrw 18:20 CET. http://t.co/Pap0lyLuNN
Super agenda today, presentations had real depth. Hope you found the tweets interesting and I hope you engage with #EUmanagestress tomorrow.
Give staff a voice, not just for #stress. Delegate responsibility for interventions to teams. Roll out, not big bang. #EUmanagestress #SME
Cover organisational issues AND individual concerns. Keep talking and tailoring the interventions. #EUmanagestress #SME
Keep things simple and identify champions for the process. #EUmanagestress #SME
A top-down approach to intervention doesn't work with SMEs. #EUmanagestress #SME
Train-up competent users within the organisation who can be a point of contact for people. #EUmanagestress #SME
Workers can spend 40% of time at work, 40% asleep, the rest with family. The psychosocial work environment is important! #EUmanagestress
What are the practical lessons learnt from employers on managing psychosocial risks? #EUmanagestress
The e-guide caters for both workers and employers, so it could be a good framework for more engagement on the issue. #EUmanagestress
This is a screen shot of the new e-guide on how to tackle stress at work. Functionality looks great. #EUmanagestress http://t.co/obj5YpNrE6
Were listeners surprised that 15-20% of all cases of #depression can be statistically attributed to work-related stress? #EUmanagestress
Thanks for the interest and RTs so far. Next up: more on the e-guide and then Peter Kelly @H_S_E with a case study. #EUmanagestress
E-guide to managing stress & psychosocial risks includes campaign material, national legal positions and other elements . #EUmanagestress
The e-guide will be available on the Healthy Workplaces website at the end of November. #EUmanagestress
The aim of the e-guide is to provide a general framework of risk management, not to tell people what they should do. #EUmanagestress
Richard Graveling on the new e-guide on how to tackle stress at work. #EUmanagestress http://t.co/DnPocIq6Z4
Less than 30% of organisations have the tools to deal with psychosocial risks. #EUmanagestress
High workload AND limited opportunities for control is a dangerous mix. #EUmanagestress
There is a significant increased risk of #depression related to work-related stress. #EUmanagestress
Work stress affects the number of natural killer cells in the blood. #EUmanagestress
When does #stress become critical for health? When chronic stressors require active coping. #EUmanagestress
